actor_awards.notes: A German actress, model, and painter who became a leading Hollywood sex symbol in the 1960s. She won a Golden Globe for New Star of the Year for The Prize (1963). She famously starred as the leading lady in the second Pink Panther film, A Shot in the Dark.

filmography.title: A Shot in the Dark
filmography.role_description: A beautiful maid accused of murder who becomes the object of Inspector Clouseau's affection and clumsy investigation.
filmography.plot: Inspector Jacques Clouseau investigates a murder case where all evidence points to a beautiful maid, but he is convinced of her innocence.

filmography.title: The Prize
filmography.role_description: A Swedish Foreign Office attaché assigned to guide a heavy-drinking American novelist during the Nobel Prize ceremonies.
filmography.plot: An American Nobel Prize winner stumbles onto a Soviet plot to kidnap another laureate during the award ceremonies in Stockholm.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – New Star of the Year - Actress

filmography.title: Lisa and the Devil
filmography.role_description: A tourist in Spain who gets lost and finds herself trapped in a mansion filled with bizarre characters and a butler who resembles the devil.
filmography.plot: A tourist seeks refuge in an old mansion where she is drawn into a web of past crimes and supernatural occurrences.

filmography.title: Deadlier Than the Male
filmography.role_description: A glamorous and ruthless assassin who eliminates business rivals for hire.
filmography.plot: Bulldog Drummond investigates a series of murders of high-profile businessmen executed by a pair of beautiful female assassins.

filmography.title: The Wrecking Crew
filmography.role_description: A suspicious contact who may or may not be working against spy Matt Helm.
filmography.plot: Secret agent Matt Helm is sent to investigate the hijacking of a gold shipment and stop a global financial crisis.

filmography.title: Baron Blood
filmography.role_description: A student helping to restore an Austrian castle who becomes the target of a resurrected sadist.
filmography.plot: A young man visits his ancestral castle in Austria and inadvertently brings his sadistic ancestor back to life.

filmography.title: Ten Little Indians
filmography.role_description: A secretary with a dark secret who is one of the guests invited to an isolated hotel in the Iranian desert.
filmography.plot: Ten strangers are summoned to a remote hotel in the Iranian desert by a mysterious host, only to find that they are being killed off one by one.

filmography.title: The Oscar
filmography.role_description: The sketch artist girlfriend of a ruthless actor who claws his way to an Academy Award nomination.
filmography.plot: An unscrupulous actor uses everyone around him to advance his career and secure an Oscar nomination.

filmography.title: The Victors
filmography.role_description: A German woman who encounters American soldiers during the occupation of Berlin.
filmography.plot: A group of American soldiers experiences the horrors and moral ambiguities of World War II across Europe.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Most Promising Newcomer

filmography.title: Boy, Did I Get a Wrong Number!
filmography.role_description: A Hollywood starlet who hides out in the home of a real estate agent to escape the studio.
filmography.plot: A real estate agent gets into trouble when he accidentally agrees to help a runaway movie star hide from her boss.

filmography.title: Zeppelin
filmography.role_description: The wife of a German Zeppelin designer who becomes involved in a British spy's mission during WWI.
filmography.plot: A British spy infiltrates the crew of a new German Zeppelin during World War I to steal its secrets.

filmography.title: The Money Trap
filmography.role_description: The wife of a wealthy man whose money becomes the target of a corrupt cop.
filmography.plot: A police detective facing financial ruin turns to crime to maintain his high-society wife's lifestyle.

filmography.title: The Art of Love
filmography.role_description: The beautiful neighbor and love interest of a struggling writer in Paris.
filmography.plot: An artist fakes his own death to increase the value of his paintings, but his friend gets accused of his murder.

filmography.title: The Venetian Affair
filmography.role_description: The ex-wife of a reporter who is drawn into an espionage plot in Venice.
filmography.plot: A reporter is sent to Venice to investigate the suicide of a diplomat and gets mixed up in a spy ring involving his ex-wife.

filmography.title: Carry On Behind
filmography.role_description: A Russian archaeologist visiting a British caravan site, becoming the object of many jokes.
filmography.plot: A group of archaeologists and holidaymakers clash at a chaotic caravan site.

filmography.title: The Corrupt Ones
filmography.role_description: A woman caught between rival gangs searching for a legendary treasure in China.
filmography.plot: A freelance photographer finds an ancient medallion that leads to a hidden treasure in Peking.

filmography.title: Deadly Sanctuary
filmography.role_description: The title character (also known as 'Justine') in this adaptation of the Marquis de Sade's work.
filmography.plot: A virtuous woman faces a series of misfortunes and abuse as she tries to maintain her morals in a corrupt world.

filmography.title: The Prisoner of Zenda
filmography.role_description: The Countess involved in the court intrigue in this comedic retelling of the classic story.
filmography.plot: A bumbling London cab driver travels to Ruritania where he discovers he is the lookalike of the King.

filmography.title: Percy
filmography.role_description: One of the women encountered by the recipient of the world's first penis transplant.
filmography.plot: A young man receives the world's first penis transplant and tries to identify the donor by visiting his former lovers.

filmography.title: A Twist of Sand
filmography.role_description: A woman who hires a former naval officer to find hidden diamonds on Africa's Skeleton Coast.
filmography.plot: A former British naval officer is forced to return to the dangerous waters of Africa to find a stash of diamonds.

filmography.title: The Invincible Six
filmography.role_description: A village woman who helps a group of mercenaries defend her home from bandits.
filmography.plot: A group of international jewel thieves are forced to defend an Iranian village from a bandit chief.

filmography.title: Daniella by Night
filmography.role_description: A fashion model who is mistaken for a spy in this early German comedy.
filmography.plot: A model is arrested for espionage but manages to escape and tries to clear her name.

filmography.title: Why Bother to Knock
filmography.role_description: A beautiful Austrian girl who becomes the object of a travel agent's affection.
filmography.plot: A travel agent gives keys to his flat to various girlfriends, but complications arise when he falls for a new girl.

filmography.title: The Swiss Conspiracy
filmography.role_description: One of the bank customers being blackmailed in this action thriller.
filmography.plot: A former US Justice Department official is hired to protect five Swiss bank customers who are being blackmailed.

filmography.title: Severed Ties
filmography.role_description: The mother of the main character in this horror comedy.
filmography.plot: A man regenerates his severed arm with a reptilian limb and uses it to take revenge on those who wronged him.
